resources.string:
1. Beat eggs and sugar.
2. Add soft butter to the egg-sugar mixture and mix.
3. We extinguish the soda.
4. Stir in the sifted flour.
5. Place the resulting dough in the refrigerator for 20 minutes.
6. Roll out the dough to a thickness of 5–7 mm.
7. Bake for 12–15 minutes at 180 degrees.
